job.title: Remote Sr. Software Engineer - Go or Java, React
job.description:
If you are a Remote Sr. Software Engineer - Go or Java, React with experience, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
4.7/5 Stars on Glassdoor
Fantastic culture of growth collaboration
Great technologies
Mission driven
Competitive salary & benefits
Remote!
What You Will Be Doing
Design software apps and features in Golang, React and React-native
Implement solutions quickly and efficiently
Lead by demonstrating good coding practices
Build testing and reporting features throughout the process to deliver great quality and easily maintainable software
Collaborate & Coordinate with product, data, revenue and company stakeholders to design market winning products
Develop and collect metrics to drive continuous improvement of existing products
As needed, mentor/lead small developer teams, providing mentorship and fostering a culture of growth for junior developers
What You Need for this Position
So, if you are a Remote Sr. Software Engineer - Go or Java, React with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Maria.Reyes@CyberCoders.com
Maria Reyes - Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
